channel.title: Design on Everyday Theory

item.title: What From How
item.description: Find the right people and you can have an hours long conversation over functional programming and object oriented programming. Ultimately, I don’t think either side would fully get to the point. The primary point is to separate out what your code does from how your code does it. Once you have a deep understanding of that, everything starts to look like imperative programming. Let’s explore. Functional Core; Imperative Shell ”Functional Core; Imperative Shell”.
